name: BuildingBlocks
shortdesc: A collection of cross reference building blocks.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Creates a new cross reference building block.

parameter.name: appliedCharacterStyle
parameter.shortdesc: Character style to be applied to the building block. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: customText
parameter.shortdesc: Building block custom text. Currently this is only useful in custom string building block. It is ignored for other types of building blocks. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new BuildingBlock &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the BuildingBlock.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the BuildingBlock with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the BuildingBlocks within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The BuildingBlock, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: BuildingBlock, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The BuildingBlock, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: BuildingBlock, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first BuildingBlock in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last BuildingBlock in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle BuildingBlock in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the BuildingBlock with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the BuildingBlock that follows the desired BuildingBlock.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the BuildingBlock whose index follows the specified BuildingBlock in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The BuildingBlock whose index comes before the desired BuildingBlock.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any BuildingBlock in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every BuildingBlock in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the BuildingBlock.
Returns the BuildingBlock with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
